TopicTitle: Little Hermes - LKO on a shoestring [pic heavy]

Articles.Content:
Presenting "Little Hermes"

A proof-of-concept hybrid turbojet engine capable of reaching low Kerbin orbit:

It's low radar profile makes it ideal as a body for smaller reconnaissance vehicles.

With a capable atmospheric velocity in excess of 1000m/s (max speed is top-secret).

Although this self-contained prototype is capable of low Kerbin orbit, it would be ideal as a base for smaller vehicles or as an engine for a larger space-plane.

The "Little Hermes" hybrid jet-engine would be ideally suited for defense contractors, or even for SSTO projects.

Craft file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/v37uc3iftnsq5hv/Little%20Hermes.craft

The creator is not responsible for performance failures or death or injury resulting from this engine
